text: Man from the Black Hills is a 1952 American western film directed by Thomas Carr and starring Johnny Mack Brown, James Ellison and Rand Brooks.Drew p.179 The film's sets were designed by the art director Martin Obzina. ==Main cast== * Johnny Mack Brown as Johnny Mack Brown * James Ellison as Jim Fallon * Rand Brooks as Fake Jimmy Fallon * Lane Bradford as Sheriff Moran * I. Stanford Jolley as Pete Ingram * Stanley Andrews as Pop Fallon * Denver Pyle as Glenn Hartley * Ray Bennett as Hugh Delaney * Robert Bray as Ed Roper * Florence Lake as Martha * Stanley Price as Bill Shealey * Joel Allen as Deputy Bates ==References== ==Bibliography== * Bernard A. Drew. Motion Picture Series and Sequels: A Reference Guide. Routledge, 2013. ==External links== * Category:1952 films Category:1952 Western (genre) films Category:English- language films Category:American films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:Films directed by Thomas Carr Category:Monogram Pictures films Category:Films scored by Raoul Kraushaar
title: Man from the Black Hills
